comments: Indices of b in the sequence closed under a -> abc, b -> a, c -> a, starting with a(1) = a; see A092606 where a = 0, b = 2, c = 1. - _Philippe Deléham_, Apr 12 2004
references: A. Brousseau, Fibonacci and Related Number Theoretic Tables. Fibonacci Association, San Jose, CA, 1972, p. 67.
L. Carlitz, R. Scoville and V. E. Hoggatt, Jr., Representations for a special sequence, Fib. Quart., 10 (1972), 499-518, 550.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: a(n) = A003157(n) - 1 = A079523(n) + n. - _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 22 2004
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
